short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension convert a url in a code qr to pass to a mobile (for example take a url to share in whatsap)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever tried to send via whatsapp (for example) a friend a youtube video you're seeing on your computer? Now you can!

Url take away allows you, through a QR code reader, get the url from your browser fast and free!

Simply have a QR code reader to click on "Url Take Away 'and' presto 'MAGIC!

It's a good idea not?
